Collection.LongName: TES/Aura L2 CH4 Nadir Special Observation
Collection.DataSetId: TES/Aura L2 CH4 Nadir Special Observation V006
Collection.Description: Atmospheric vertical profile estimates and associated errors (diagonals and covariance matrices), along with retrieved surface temperature, cloud effective optical depth, column estimates, quality flags, averaging kernels and a priori constraint vectors.
Collection.SuggestedUsage: Profiles can be compared to other measurements or models of this species or used as input to global chemical/dynamical models
Collection.ProcessingLevelDescription: Geophysical Quantities at the sensor resolution or geolocated
Collection.VersionDescription: New O3 climatology data. Updated Methane climatology data. Updated max Optical Path Difference values. New Chi2 quality flag reported. New desert emissivity flag. Updated GMAO a priori values.
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: The data used in this study were produced by the TES Science Team at the TES SIPS and archived at the Langley DAAC. See ProductionDateTime for Published date.

Contact.HoursOfService: 8:00 A.M. to 4:30 P.M., U.S. Eastern Time, Monday through Friday, excluding U.S. holidays.

Address.StreetAddress: NASA Langley Research Center, Mail Stop 157D

Instrument.Technique: Limb and Nadir viewing Infrared Fourier Transform Spectrometer

Sensor.LongName: Pointing FTS with 4 co-aligned detector arrays, 16 pixels each

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Digital object identifier that uniquely identifies this data product

AdditionalAttribute.Name: identifier_product_doi_authority
AdditionalAttribute.Description: URL of the digital object identifier resolving authority
